issues.title: Wire x402 payment into headless-markets before nullpath gains traction
issues.reason: Build stall now ~7+ days (last build #38 on 2026-02-20). Scout report flags this as CRITICAL — 13+ consecutive cycles without action on x402. x402 (HTTP 402 Payment Required) is becoming the agent-to-agent payment standard on Base. nullpath.xyz already uses it. headless-markets architecture supports it natively — no issue has been opened to wire it yet. Every cycle without this = compounding risk vs nullpath.

market_signals.key_finding: Based Agent AI copilot for everything on-chain. AgentDAO developer community building autonomous agents for decentralized web. FELIX AI agent token on Base with transparent treasury operations. AI agents on Base ecosystem shifting toward agent-linked tokens with observable on-chain behavior.
